attributes.action: Instruct local councils to adopt all council estates roads as public highway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently not all councils are doing this.

Consequently residents on council estates are paying their council tax as well as high service charges.

These charges include street cleaning and road repairs, which for most other people in the council are part of the council tax. 

Parking fees levied by the council are 3 times as high as in other residential parking zones. 

The extra and double! charges seem extremely unfair for council estate residents, who most definitely are not among the wealthiest.
